page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SHEONA
page.content: My name is{Sheona Stewart},I am eleven years old and attend Crombie Primary in Westhill. I wake up in the morning,put on my school skirt,blouse,tie and cardigan.I have my breakfast,usually toast and drinking chocolate. I arrive at school at 8.50am.Morning work consists of math's and Language. Playtime is at 10.30 till 10.50.I work until 12.30 and go home for lunch which is usually a sandwich or hamburger. In the afternoon I do project work. Each week we have art,P.E.,drama,music and Home Economics. After school I do my homework before tea at 5.30.Then I am allowed out to play on my bike or sometimes go to the park with friends. Bedtime is at 9.00pm I wash,brush my teeth and read before going to sleep.
